website_summaries.verdict: Cats & Dogs sports a surprisingly deep “Create A Pet” mode that allows users to make their dream pal, and unleash these animals on your Sims adds even more depth to The Sims 4.
pros: Fully customize cats and dogs for your Sims
Pet lovers will enjoy the expansive new Brindleton Bay area
cons: It’s a shame that a new pet takes up one of the eight family member slots per home

customer_reviews.title: Did not realize there is no disc included when ordering ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not realize there is no disc included when ordering. It’s download only. If I would’ve known that, I would’ve just ordered from the Origin website.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Owens

customer_reviews.title: Received promptly as described. 4 stars because EA no ...
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly as described. 4 stars because EA no longer includes a DVD with their games. All are downloadable content now.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Justice

customer_reviews.title: a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to have cats and dogs for my sims. there are so many breeds to choose from and I love being able to give all of the pets their own personalities. Just like me pets in real life!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Sims 4 cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: The sims 4 cats and dogs dlc is great! I love all the animals and being your own veterinarian is cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Osmond

customer_reviews.title: A hit with the recipient
customer_reviews.text: This has kept my granddaughter entertained since she got it. She loves it and it's very versatile allowing her to program a great deal of flexibilty into what goes on.
customer_reviews.author: B. Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Can't download dogs or create them,  crashes every time and Im using updated software on desktop
customer_reviews.text: I took off a few stars because you cant even download dogs without it crashing and having to restart it Every time! I have a newee model Lenovo desktop and updated software yet cant even get my moneys worth when the best part of making a dog doesn't work. Not pleased at all.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ringleka

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a high Sims fan and waited anxiously for cats & dogs to be released. Lives up to expectations, maybe even exceeds them. The graphics are great. Keeps my daughter interested. She loves the animals she can create.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: best addition to sims ever
customer_reviews.text: best addition to sims ever! i've been waiting to be able to make my cat and it's just as awesome as you'd hope and imagine. do itttttt
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen Hammad

customer_reviews.title: Add-on for  Sims 4 game
customer_reviews.text: This was also on my grand kids Christmas wish list. Caused a lot of excitement around here! Looked like fun!

customer_reviews.title: She couldn't wait for this one to be released

customer_reviews.title: a valentines day gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: she says it has endless aspects of customizing in looks and traits. a must get for sims 4 lovers and pet lovers :)

customer_reviews.title: Recommend you buying
customer_reviews.text: I love this game I’m so addicted. You get to train pets on her and also take care of them. It’s fun if you like cats and dogs.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the Game
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the cost. Nice design & spot on.

customer_reviews.title: Great expansion pack
customer_reviews.text: Great expansion pack. You can pick a breed, create a mixed breed using genetics, or create a whole new breed. There is a new town and it’s beautiful, also includes the ability to buy a vet clinic and adds new skills. It’s great

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift for my niece aspiring to be a veterinarian and it got me an uncharacteristic big hug. Works for me.

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: Didn't read completely, thought it had a CD in it. Paid way more for an empty case! Could've paid less directly from EA games.

customer_reviews.author: cool stuff

customer_reviews.title: Empty Box, No Disc, Download Only
customer_reviews.text: Misleading/lack of product description. Thought I was getting a disc, nope just an empty box. Would not have paid $54 for a download.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Horrible business!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this a zero!!! I’m so bugged with this company who didn’t make it clear that Sims 4 is required for this game. After not being able to download it, we looked into why and THEN found out in the question and answer section that Sims 4 was required. We are now being told that since we used the code to try and download the game, we can’t get our money back even though we will never be able to play the game...especially now since we returned everything for a refund we’ll never get. Horrible business!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The game was in good shape. The code would not work, though.
customer_reviews.author: James D Lingenfelter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old loves this game and has spent hours playing it
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O.

product_meta.title: The Sims 4 Cats & Dogs - PC
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:Cats & Dogs

Create a variety of cats and dogs, add them to your Sims’ homes to forever change their lives, and care 
for neighborhood pets as a veterinarian with The Sims™ 4 Cats & Dogs*. The powerful new Create A Pet tool lets you personalize cats and dogs, each with their own unique appearances, distinct behaviors, and 
for the first time, expressive outfits These wonderful, lifelong companions will change your Sims’ lives in new and special ways. Treat animal ailments as a veterinarian and run your own clinic in a beautiful coastal world where there’s so much for your Sims and their pets to discover.

KEY FEATURES 
Create Cats and Dogs– Use the powerful Create A Pet tool to express your creativity as you 
customize your Sims’ perfect cats, dogs, puppies, and kittens. Choose from a variety of breeds, 
give them distinct personalities, and directly manipulate their features. Easily personalize their coats with unique patterns to create your real-life pets, dream pets, or something more fanciful. For the first time, complete their looks with expressive outfits and accessories.

Bond with Your Pets– Experience the companionship and fun that furry friends bring to your Sims’ lives. Cats and dogs have minds of their own and form special relationships with Sims based on their daily interactions. Your Sims care for, train, and play games with their pets who all exhibit distinct and sometimes bizarre animal behaviors.

Become a Vet and Run a Clinic– Build a veterinary clinic, hire a dedicated staff, and further your career as the town’s most promising animal doctor. You’re in control of daily operations from the services offered to what you charge. Your Sims can diagnose and cure pets with critical surgeries or treat fleas and other afflictions with simple medications.

Explore Brindleton Bay– Discover the coastal shores of Brindleton Bay, a new world where your Sims and their pets can live and enjoy outdoor activities. Play fetch near the harbor docks, take a walk to the lighthouse, or visit a park to setup an obstacle course and meet other pet-loving locals. Be on the lookout for stray pets that your Sims can take in as their own.



*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 GAME (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY. SEE WWW.THESIMS.COM/CATS-AND-DOGS-FAQ FOR MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS EXPANSION. 2017 ELECTRONIC ARTS INC.
feature_bullets: Create Cats and Dogs Use the powerful Create A Pet tool to express your creativity as you customize your Sims' perfect cats, dogs, puppies, and kittens.
Bond with Your Pets Experience the companionship and fun that furry friends bring to your Sims' lives.
Become a Vet and Run a Clinic Build a veterinary clinic, hire a dedicated staff, and further your career as the town's most promising animal doctor.
Explore Brindle ton Bay Discover the coastal shores of Brindle ton Bay, a new world where your Sims and their pets can live and enjoy outdoor activities.
